title: Worgfang
content:
ther features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

'No goblin will strike you down' is etched into this dagger's handle. When goblin assailants realised they couldn't kill the dagger's original owner, they gave him to the worgs, who made short work of him.

Worgfang Location & Where to Find

Location: In the Worg Pens at the Shattered Sanctum, on a skeleton in the pen with
